articles.author: Taylor Nicioli
articles.title: Certain species of bats can glow under UV light. Scientists don’t know why - CNN
articles.description: Six species of North American bats glow under ultraviolet lighting, according to a new study. Researchers don’t know why certain mammals exhibit this odd trait.
articles.content:
Glowing bats may sound like Halloween decor, but researchers in Georgia have discovered certain species of North American bats that are capable of the unusual trick.
